ios.name: iPhone / iPad
steps: Open the Voice Memos app (pre-installed on all iOS devices)
Tap the red record button to start recording
Place your device 6-12 inches from the speaker for optimal quality
Tap stop when finished
Tap the recording to rename it
Tap the share button and select 'Save to Files' or upload directly to our site
tips: Use a quiet room with minimal echo
Consider using AirPods or external mic for better quality

android.name: Android
steps: Open your default Voice Recorder app (or download one from Play Store)
Tap the record button to start
Hold your phone 6-12 inches from the speaker
Tap stop when finished
Save the recording with a descriptive name
Share via email, cloud storage, or upload directly to our site
tips: Turn on 'Do Not Disturb' mode to avoid interruptions
Use the phone's bottom microphone for better pickup
Keep the device steady during recording

mac.name: Mac
steps: Open QuickTime Player (found in Applications folder)
Go to File > New Audio Recording
Click the red record button
Position yourself 1-2 feet from the built-in microphone
Click stop when finished
Save the file (File > Save) and upload to our site
tips: Use an external USB microphone for professional quality
Close other applications to avoid notification sounds
Record in a room with soft furnishings to reduce echo

apps.name: GarageBand
apps.description: Advanced features for music and podcasting

windows.name: Windows PC
steps: Open Voice Recorder app (search for it in Start menu)
Click the microphone button to start recording
Speak clearly into your computer's microphone
Click stop when finished
The recording will be saved automatically
Right-click the recording to find the file location and upload
tips: Use a USB headset for better audio quality
Close browser tabs and other apps to reduce background noise
Position the microphone away from keyboard and mouse

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Neural Summary, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service. We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and are committed to protecting your personal data.

dataController.title: Data Controller

dataCollected.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our Service:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.name: Name (optional)
personal.payment: Payment information (processed securely via third-party providers)

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.audioFiles: Audio files you upload for transcription

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

contract.title: Contract Performance
contract.content: Processing necessary to provide you with our transcription and analysis services.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: Processing based on your explicit consent for marketing communications and analytics.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests
legitimate.content: Processing necessary for our legitimate interests in improving our services and preventing fraud.

legal.title: Legal Obligations
legal.content: Processing necessary to comply with legal obligations, such as tax and accounting requirements.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the collected data for various purposes:

purposes.service: To provide and maintain our transcription and analysis services
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about your account and service updates
purposes.improvement: To improve and personalize your experience
purposes.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
purposes.compliance: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms
purposes.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our service (with your consent)

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.content: We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our Service:
dataSharing.notice: We never sell your personal data to third parties. All service providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and can only use your data to provide services to us.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy:

userRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
userRights.content: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: You have the right to request copies of your personal data we hold.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.content: You have the right to request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.content: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.content: You have the right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.

restriction.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restriction.content: You have the right to request restriction of processing under certain circumstances.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.content: You have the right to object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing.

withdraw.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: Where processing is based on consent, you have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

userRights.howToExercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at the email address provided below.
userRights.responseTime: We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by GDPR.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

measures.title: Security Measures
measures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for data in transit and at rest
measures.access: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms
measures.monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection
measures.backup: Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures
measures.training: Regular security training for our staff
measures.incident: Incident response and breach notification procedures

dataSecurity.breach: In the event of a data breach that poses a risk to your rights and freedoms, we will notify you and the relevant supervisory authority within 72 hours as required by GDPR.
